Package pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object
The Piece class represents a chess piece

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece(int x, int y, boolean alive, boolean white)
      The constructor for the Piece class, initializes the x, y, alive, and white
      Parameters:
      x - X cord of piece on the board
      y - Y cord of piece on the board
      alive - True if alive, false if not
      white - True if white and false if black

    • validMove

      public abstract boolean validMove(Board board, int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY)
      This abstract method checks if a move on a chess board is valid for a piece
      Parameters:
      board - Represents the chess board
      startX - The starting 'x' cord of the piece on the board
      startY - The starting 'y' cord of the piece on the board
      endX - The ending 'x' cord of the piece on the board
      endY - The ending 'y' cord of the piece on the board
      Returns:
      True if the move is valid, false if not
